name: Oldage
description:
Oldage is a turnbased strategy game with unique characters, charm, and originality. You can create hundreds of combinations of units, weaving a unique strategy each game. 
Finally, a 0 RNG game that is easy to learn, but hard to master! For FREE! 
It comes with a competitive ranked ladder, rewarding those with the best strategies! There is also an ELO system, try to become ranked in the top 100!
